price: De: “Həqiqətən, Rəbbim istədiyinin ruzisini bol edər, (istədiyininkini də) azaldar. Lakin insanların çoxu (bunu) bilməz”.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
